scripts.build: mkdir -p dist/cgi-bin && make -C ../../ && cp cgi-bin/*.sh dist/cgi-bin/ && chmod +x dist/cgi-bin/*.sh && cp index.html dist/ && esbuild script.js --bundle --outfile=dist/script.js --minify && esbuild styles.css --bundle --outfile=dist/style.css --minify
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.watch: mkdir -p dist && cp index.html dist/ && esbuild script.js --bundle --outfile=dist/script.js --watch & esbuild styles.css --bundle --outfile=dist/style.css --watch
